title: Please someone help..
body: So I just got into a ranked game and tried to load in and my game wouldnt let me load in.... it kept saying my internet wasnt working when it was. I was watching youtube just fine so i went and restart my comp and by the time i went to log back in i had the low q pop up... This is completely stupid how im gonna have to wait now because the game wouldnt let me load in.....

replies.body: Even though you can watch Youtube or use other services, you can still get blocks connected to specific servers. Getting a lower queue isn't fun, so I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this, and a custom game for testing.  Once you know you're in the clear, you can clear out those games.

I mean i think its pretty stupid that you should even get them, because i literally just got out of a ranked before that game were i had the problem loading in. My game went so smoothly too. But then out of no where it said I couldnt connect multiple times even after i would try to fix it.. But i already know yall arent really going to help :/ Oh well..
Thanks..

I can guide you to a fix, but you have to help yourself too.  Queuing up for another matchmade with an unstable connection like this is only going to escalate [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) and degrade your rank.  I really want to help you here, but you got to want it.  :D  I know you're having a frustrating situation, so I hope you'll reconsider!  Good luck!
Update: Just went everything and nothing fucking worked. Sweet. Thanks anyways though.
